para: Copy an ℑ, possibly into a different µ.

The µ named by the microstructure parameter is the destination µ, to which the ℑ will be copied. If the destination µ is not the µ in which the source ℑ resides, then it must have the same physical and pixel sizes as the ℑ. If the destination µ does not already exist, then it will be created. The new µ will have the same sizes as the µ containing the ℑ being copied.
If the given name for the copied ℑ is not unique in the destination µ, then it will be made unique by appending <x>, where x is an integer.
